# JobDhari Feature Map (Auto-Generated)

Generated: 2025-12-26T06:16:44.558Z

> Generated by `npm run docs:featuremap`.
> Do not manually edit sections below—edit code annotations instead.

## Features (from @feature annotations)

### Candidate Dashboard

- **Page**: `src/app/candidate/dashboard/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Candidate home: profile summary + applied jobs list (MVP) with upgrade-ready tabs
  - Routes: /candidate/dashboard
- **Firebase Service**: `src/lib/firebase/candidateDashboardService.ts`
  - Responsibility: Fetch candidate applications joined with job data (read-only)
  - Exports: `CandidateApplicationWithJob`, `listCandidateApplicationsWithJobs`

### Candidate Entry

- **Page**: `src/app/candidate/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: One entry page for candidate. Decides where to go.
  - Routes: /candidate
- **Page**: `src/app/candidate/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: One entry page for candidate. Decides where to go.
  - Routes: /candidate
- **Page**: `src/app/candidate/signup/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Redirect legacy signup route to canonical login flow
  - Routes: /candidate/signup

### Employer Dashboard

- **Page**: `src/app/employer/dashboard/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Server wrapper that renders the client dashboard
  - Routes: /employer/dashboard
  - Exports: `dynamic`
- **Other**: `src/app/employer/layout.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Employer navigation shell + content outlet
  - Routes: /employer/*

### Employer Jobs

- **Page**: `src/app/employer/my-jobs/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Non-MVP page placeholder (redirect to dashboard)
  - Routes: /employer/my-jobs

### Employer Jobs Service

- **Firebase Service**: `src/lib/firebase/employerJobsService.ts`
  - Responsibility: Employer job CRUD (create, list, publish)
  - Routes: /employer/dashboard, /employer/post-job
  - Exports: `EmployerJob`, `JobStatus`, `createEmployerJob`, `listEmployerJobs`

### Job Application

- **Page**: `src/app/apply/[id]/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Apply gate (auth check → profile check → read-only confirmation)
  - Routes: /apply/[id]
- **Firebase Service**: `src/lib/firebase/applicationService.ts`
  - Responsibility: Application read/write logic (duplicate-check + persistence)
  - Exports: `ApplicationStatus`, `JobApplication`, `applyToJob`, `getUserAppliedJobIds`, `hasAppliedToJob`, `listApplicationsForJob`

### Public Jobs

- **Other**: `src/app/jobs/JobsPageClient.tsx`
  - Responsibility: List and search published jobs for candidates
  - Routes: /jobs
- **Page**: `src/app/jobs/[id]/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Job detail view + single-source Apply UX
  - Routes: /jobs/[id]
- **Firebase Service**: `src/lib/firebase/publicJobsService.ts`
  - Responsibility: Read-only public job discovery (open + published)
  - Exports: `PublicJob`, `listPublicJobs`

### Public Jobs Browse

- **Page**: `src/app/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Public home hero + search entry into /jobs
  - Routes: /

### Recruiter Analytics

- **Page**: `src/app/recruiter/analytics/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Non-MVP placeholder (analytics not implemented)
  - Routes: /recruiter/analytics

### Resume Formatter

- **Page**: `src/app/resume-formatter/page.tsx`
  - Responsibility: Non-MVP placeholder (PDF export not implemented)
  - Routes: /resume-formatter
